fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At day, choose a statement that was said during the day. The timeline will alter itself so that the statement is true, if it was true, or false, if it was false. If it's neither true nor false, or indiscernable whether it's true or false by the host, whoever said it dies.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You have one use of your ability while dead.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the Town lose, alive or dead.
